ayah: طسٓمٓ
ayah_translit: ta-seen-meem
ayah_english: Ta Seem Meem

ayah: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: These (are the) Verses (of) the Book the clear

ayah: نَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: natlu alayka min naba-i musa wafir'awna bil-haqi liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: We recite to you from (the) news (of) Musa and Firaun in truth for a people who believe

ayah: إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ عَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهۡلَهَا شِيَعٗا يَسۡتَضۡعِفُ طَآئِفَةٗ مِّنۡهُمۡ يُذَبِّحُ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ نِسَآءَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: inna fir'awna ala fi al-ardi waja'ala ahlaha shiya'an yastad'ifu taifatan min'hum yudhabbihu abnaahum wayastahyi nisaahum innahu kana mina al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: Indeed Firaun exalted himself in the land and made its people (into) sects oppressing a group among them slaughtering their sons and letting live their women Indeed he was of the corrupters

ayah: إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ عَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهۡلَهَا شِيَعٗا يَسۡتَضۡعِفُ طَآئِفَةٗ مِّنۡهُمۡ يُذَبِّحُ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ نِسَآءَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah: إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ عَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهۡلَهَا شِيَعٗا يَسۡتَضۡعِفُ طَآئِفَةٗ مِّنۡهُمۡ يُذَبِّحُ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ نِسَآءَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: inna fir'awna ala fi al-ardi waja'ala ahlaha shiya'an yastad'ifu taifatan min'hum yudhabbihu abnaahum wayastahyi nisaahum innahu kana mina al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: Indeed Firaun exalted himself in the land and made its people (into) sects oppressing a group among them slaughtering their sons and letting live their women Indeed he was of the corrupters

ayah_english: Indeed Firaun exalted himself in the land and made its people (into) sects oppressing a group among them slaughtering their sons and letting live their women Indeed he was of the corrupters

ayah: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
ayah_translit: wanuridu an namunna ala alladhina us'tud'ifu fi al-ardi wanaj'alahum a-immatan wanaj'alahumu al-warithina
ayah_english: And We wanted to bestow a favor upon those who were oppressed in the land and make them leaders and make them the inheritors

ayah: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَحۡذَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wanumakkina lahum fi al-ardi wanuriya fir'awna wahamana wajunudahuma min'hum ma kanu yahdharuna
ayah_english: And [We] establish them in the land and show Firaun and Haman and their hosts through them what they were fearing

ayah: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَحۡذَرُونَ

ayah: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِۖ فَإِذَا خِفۡتِ عَلَيۡهِ فَأَلۡقِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِي وَلَا تَحۡزَنِيٓۖ إِنَّا رَآدُّوهُ إِلَيۡكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-awhayna ila ummi musa an ardi'ihi fa-idha khif'ti alayhi fa-alqihi fi al-yami wala takhafi wala tahzani inna radduhu ilayki waja'iluhu mina al-mur'salina
ayah_english: And We inspired [to] (the) mother (of) Musa that Suckle him but when you fear for him then cast him in(to) the river and (do) not fear and (do) not grieve Indeed We (will) restore him to you and (will) make him of the Messengers

ayah: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِۖ فَإِذَا خِفۡتِ عَلَيۡهِ فَأَلۡقِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِي وَلَا تَحۡزَنِيٓۖ إِنَّا رَآدُّوهُ إِلَيۡكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

ayah_translit: wa-awhayna ila ummi musa an ardi'ihi fa-idha khif'ti alayhi fa-alqihi fi al-yami wala takhafi wala tahzani inna radduhu ilayki waja'iluhu mina al-mur'salina

ayah: فَٱلۡتَقَطَهُۥٓ ءَالُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لِيَكُونَ لَهُمۡ عَدُوّٗا وَحَزَنًاۗ إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُواْ خَٰطِـِٔينَ
ayah_translit: fal-taqatahu alu fir'awna liyakuna lahum aduwwan wahazanan inna fir'awna wahamana wajunudahuma kanu khatiina
ayah_english: Then picked him up (the) family (of) Firaun so that he might become to them an enemy and a grief Indeed Firaun and Haman and their hosts were sinners

ayah: فَٱلۡتَقَطَهُۥٓ ءَالُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لِيَكُونَ لَهُمۡ عَدُوّٗا وَحَزَنًاۗ إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُواْ خَٰطِـِٔينَ

ayah_english: Then picked him up (the) family (of) Firaun so that he might become to them an enemy and a grief Indeed Firaun and Haman and their hosts were sinners

ayah: وَقَالَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قُرَّتُ عَيۡنٖ لِّي وَلَكَۖ لَا تَقۡتُلُوهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalati im'ra-atu fir'awna qurratu aynin li walaka la taqtuluhu asa an yanfa'ana aw nattakhidhahu waladan wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: And said (the) wife (of) Firaun A comfort (of the) eye for me and for you (Do) not kill him perhaps (that) he may benefit us or we may take him (as) a son And they (did) not perceive

ayah: وَقَالَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قُرَّتُ عَيۡنٖ لِّي وَلَكَۖ لَا تَقۡتُلُوهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

ayah: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ إِن كَادَتۡ لَتُبۡدِي بِهِۦ لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-asbaha fuadu ummi musa farighan in kadat latub'di bihi lawla an rabatna ala qalbiha litakuna mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And became (the) heart (of the) mother (of) Musa empty That she was near (to) disclosing about him if not that We strengthened [over] her heart so that she would be of the believers

ayah: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ إِن كَادَتۡ لَتُبۡدِي بِهِۦ لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-asbaha fuadu ummi musa farighan in kadat latub'di bihi lawla an rabatna ala qalbiha litakuna mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And became (the) heart (of the) mother (of) Musa empty That she was near (to) disclosing about him if not that We strengthened [over] her heart so that she would be of the believers

ayah: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ إِن كَادَتۡ لَتُبۡدِي بِهِۦ لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalat li-ukh'tihi qussihi fabasurat bihi an junubin wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: And she said to his sister Follow him So she watched him from a distance while they (did) not perceive

ayah: ۞وَحَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَرَاضِعَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَقَالَتۡ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ بَيۡتٖ يَكۡفُلُونَهُۥ لَكُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ نَٰصِحُونَ
ayah_translit: waharramna alayhi al-maradi'a min qablu faqalat hal adullukum ala ahli baytin yakfulunahu lakum wahum lahu nasihuna
ayah_english: And We had forbidden for him the wet nurses before before so she said Shall I direct you to (the) people (of) a house who will rear him for you while they to him (will be) sincere

ayah: ۞وَحَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَرَاضِعَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَقَالَتۡ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ بَيۡتٖ يَكۡفُلُونَهُۥ لَكُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ نَٰصِحُونَ

ayah: فَرَدَدۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّهِۦ كَيۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَ وَلِتَعۡلَمَ أَنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: faradadnahu ila ummihi kay taqarra aynuha wala tahzana walita'lama anna wa'da al-lahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So We restored him to his mother that might be comforted her eye and not she may grieve and that she would know that the Promise of Allah the Promise of Allah (is) true But most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma balagha ashuddahu wa-is'tawa ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina

ayah: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: وَدَخَلَ ٱلۡمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيۡنِ يَقۡتَتِلَانِ هَٰذَا مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ وَهَٰذَا مِنۡ عَدُوِّهِۦۖ فَٱسۡتَغَٰثَهُ ٱلَّذِي مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ عَلَى ٱلَّذِي مِنۡ عَدُوِّهِۦ فَوَكَزَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيۡهِۖ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عَمَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَدُوّٞ مُّضِلّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wadakhala al-madinata ala hini ghaflatin min ahliha fawajada fiha rajulayni yaqtatilani hadha min shi'atihi wahadha min aduwwihi fa-is'taghathahu alladhi min shi'atihi ala alladhi min aduwwihi fawakazahu musa faqada alayhi qala hadha min amali al-shaytani innahu aduwwun mudillun mubinun
ayah_english: And he entered the city at a time (of) inattention of its people and found therein two men fighting each other this of his party and this of his enemy And called him for help the one who (was) from his party against the one who (was) from his enemy so struck him with his fist Musa and killed him and killed him He said This (is) of (the) deed (of) Shaitaan Indeed, he (is) an enemy one who misleads clearly

ayah_english: And he entered the city at a time (of) inattention of its people and found therein two men fighting each other this of his party and this of his enemy And called him for help the one who (was) from his party against the one who (was) from his enemy so struck him with his fist Musa and killed him and killed him He said This (is) of (the) deed (of) Shaitaan Indeed, he (is) an enemy one who misleads clearly

ayah: وَدَخَلَ ٱلۡمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيۡنِ يَقۡتَتِلَانِ هَٰذَا مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ وَهَٰذَا مِنۡ عَدُوِّهِۦۖ فَٱسۡتَغَٰثَهُ ٱلَّذِي مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ عَلَى ٱلَّذِي مِنۡ عَدُوِّهِۦ فَوَكَزَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيۡهِۖ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عَمَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَدُوّٞ مُّضِلّٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi inni zalamtu nafsi fa-igh'fir li faghafara lahu innahu huwa al-ghafuru al-rahimu
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Indeed I [I] have wronged my soul so forgive [for] me Then He forgave [for] him Indeed He He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi bima an'amta alayya falan akuna zahiran lil'muj'rimina
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Because You have favored [on] me so not I will be a supporter (of) the criminals

ayah: فَأَصۡبَحَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَنصَرَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِ يَسۡتَصۡرِخُهُۥۚ قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِيّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: fa-asbaha fi al-madinati khaifan yataraqqabu fa-idha alladhi is'tansarahu bil-amsi yastasrikhuhu qala lahu musa innaka laghawiyyun mubinun
ayah_english: In the morning he was in the city fearful (and) was vigilant when behold! The one who sought his help the previous day cried out to him for help Said to him Musa Indeed you (are) surely a deviator clear

ayah: فَأَصۡبَحَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَنصَرَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِ يَسۡتَصۡرِخُهُۥۚ قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِيّٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: فَأَصۡبَحَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَنصَرَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِ يَسۡتَصۡرِخُهُۥۚ قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِيّٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَبۡطِشَ بِٱلَّذِي هُوَ عَدُوّٞ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقۡتُلَنِي كَمَا قَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسَۢا بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma an arada an yabtisha bi-alladhi huwa aduwwun lahuma qala yamusa aturidu an taqtulani kama qatalta nafsan bil-amsi in turidu illa an takuna jabbaran fi al-ardi wama turidu an takuna mina al-mus'lihina
ayah_english: Then when [that] he wanted to strike the one who [he] (was) an enemy to both of them he said O Musa! Do you intend to kill me as you killed a person yesterday Not you want but that you become a tyrant in the earth and not you want that you be of the reformers

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَبۡطِشَ بِٱلَّذِي هُوَ عَدُوّٞ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقۡتُلَنِي كَمَا قَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسَۢا بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَبۡطِشَ بِٱلَّذِي هُوَ عَدُوّٞ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقۡتُلَنِي كَمَا قَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسَۢا بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ

ayah_english: Then when [that] he wanted to strike the one who [he] (was) an enemy to both of them he said O Musa! Do you intend to kill me as you killed a person yesterday Not you want but that you become a tyrant in the earth and not you want that you be of the reformers

ayah: وَجَآءَ رَجُلٞ مِّنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَلَأَ يَأۡتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقۡتُلُوكَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ إِنِّي لَكَ مِنَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wajaa rajulun min aqsa al-madinati yas'a qala yamusa inna al-mala-a yatamiruna bika liyaqtuluka fa-ukh'ruj inni laka mina al-nasihina
ayah_english: And came a man from (the) farthest end (of) the city running He said O Musa! Indeed the chiefs are taking counsel about you to kill you so leave indeed I am to you of the sincere advisors

ayah_english: And came a man from (the) farthest end (of) the city running He said O Musa! Indeed the chiefs are taking counsel about you to kill you so leave indeed I am to you of the sincere advisors

ayah: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fakharaja min'ha khaifan yataraqqabu qala rabbi najjini mina al-qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: So he left from it fearing (and) vigilant He said My Lord! Save me from the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
ayah_translit: walamma tawajjaha til'qaa madyana qala asa rabbi an yahdiyani sawaa al-sabili
ayah_english: And when he turned his face towards Madyan he said Perhaps my Lord [that] will guide me (to the) sound way

ayah: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

ayah_english: And when he turned his face towards Madyan he said Perhaps my Lord [that] will guide me (to the) sound way

ayah: وَلَمَّا وَرَدَ مَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ وَجَدَ عَلَيۡهِ أُمَّةٗ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡقُونَ وَوَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمُ ٱمۡرَأَتَيۡنِ تَذُودَانِۖ قَالَ مَا خَطۡبُكُمَاۖ قَالَتَا لَا نَسۡقِي حَتَّىٰ يُصۡدِرَ ٱلرِّعَآءُۖ وَأَبُونَا شَيۡخٞ كَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: walamma warada maa madyana wajada alayhi ummatan mina al-nasi yasquna wawajada min dunihimu im'ra-atayni tadhudani qala ma khatbukuma qalata la nasqi hatta yus'dira al-ri'au wa-abuna shaykhun kabirun
ayah_english: And when he came (to the) water (of) Madyan he found on it a group of men watering and he found besides them besides them two women keeping back He said What (is the) matter with both of you They said We cannot water We cannot water until take away the shepherds and our father (is) a very old man (is) a very old man

ayah_english: And when he came (to the) water (of) Madyan he found on it a group of men watering and he found besides them besides them two women keeping back He said What (is the) matter with both of you They said We cannot water We cannot water until take away the shepherds and our father (is) a very old man (is) a very old man

ayah: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ
ayah_translit: fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila al-zili faqala rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqirun
ayah_english: So he watered for them Then he turned back to the shade and said My Lord! Indeed I am of whatever You send to me of good (in) need

ayah: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ
ayah_translit: fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila al-zili faqala rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqirun
ayah_english: So he watered for them Then he turned back to the shade and said My Lord! Indeed I am of whatever You send to me of good (in) need

ayah: فَجَآءَتۡهُ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا تَمۡشِي عَلَى ٱسۡتِحۡيَآءٖ قَالَتۡ إِنَّ أَبِي يَدۡعُوكَ لِيَجۡزِيَكَ أَجۡرَ مَا سَقَيۡتَ لَنَاۚ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُۥ وَقَصَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَصَصَ قَالَ لَا تَخَفۡۖ نَجَوۡتَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fajaathu ih'dahuma tamshi ala is'tih'yain qalat inna abi yad'uka liyajziyaka ajra ma saqayta lana falamma jaahu waqassa alayhi al-qasasa qala la takhaf najawta mina al-qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: Then came to him one of the two women walking with shyness She said Indeed my father calls you that he may reward you (the) reward (for) what you watered for us So when he came to him and narrated to him the story he said (Do) not fear You have escaped from the people the wrongdoers

ayah_english: Then came to him one of the two women walking with shyness She said Indeed my father calls you that he may reward you (the) reward (for) what you watered for us So when he came to him and narrated to him the story he said (Do) not fear You have escaped from the people the wrongdoers

ayah: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
ayah_translit: qalat ih'dahuma yaabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-aminu
ayah_english: Said one of them O my father! Hire him Indeed (the) best whom you (can) hire (is) the strong the trustworthy

ayah: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
ayah_translit: qalat ih'dahuma yaabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-aminu
ayah_english: Said one of them O my father! Hire him Indeed (the) best whom you (can) hire (is) the strong the trustworthy

ayah: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
ayah_translit: qalat ih'dahuma yaabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-aminu
ayah_english: Said one of them O my father! Hire him Indeed (the) best whom you (can) hire (is) the strong the trustworthy

ayah: قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُنكِحَكَ إِحۡدَى ٱبۡنَتَيَّ هَٰتَيۡنِ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَأۡجُرَنِي ثَمَٰنِيَ حِجَجٖۖ فَإِنۡ أَتۡمَمۡتَ عَشۡرٗا فَمِنۡ عِندِكَۖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أَشُقَّ عَلَيۡكَۚ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: qala inni uridu an unkihaka ih'da ib'natayya hatayni ala an tajurani thamaniya hijajin fa-in atmamta ashran famin indika wama uridu an ashuqqa alayka satajiduni in shaa al-lahu mina al-salihina
ayah_english: He said Indeed, I [I] wish to marry you to one (of) my daughters (of) these two on that you serve me (for) eight years but if you complete ten then from you And not I wish to make it difficult for you You will find me if Allah wills Allah wills of the righteous

ayah: قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُنكِحَكَ إِحۡدَى ٱبۡنَتَيَّ هَٰتَيۡنِ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَأۡجُرَنِي ثَمَٰنِيَ حِجَجٖۖ فَإِنۡ أَتۡمَمۡتَ عَشۡرٗا فَمِنۡ عِندِكَۖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أَشُقَّ عَلَيۡكَۚ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah_english: He said Indeed, I [I] wish to marry you to one (of) my daughters (of) these two on that you serve me (for) eight years but if you complete ten then from you And not I wish to make it difficult for you You will find me if Allah wills Allah wills of the righteous

ayah: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَۖ أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ
ayah_translit: qala dhalika bayni wabaynaka ayyama al-ajalayni qadaytu fala ud'wana alayya wal-lahu ala ma naqulu wakilun
ayah_english: He said That (is) between me and between you Whichever (of) the two terms I complete then no injustice to me and Allah over what we say (is) a Witness

ayah: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَۖ أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ
ayah_translit: qala dhalika bayni wabaynaka ayyama al-ajalayni qadaytu fala ud'wana alayya wal-lahu ala ma naqulu wakilun

ayah: ۞فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَجَلَ وَسَارَ بِأَهۡلِهِۦٓ ءَانَسَ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ نَارٗاۖ قَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ جَذۡوَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma qada musa al-ajala wasara bi-ahlihi anasa min janibi al-turi naran qala li-ahlihi um'kuthu inni anastu naran la'alli atikum min'ha bikhabarin aw jadhwatin mina al-nari la'allakum tastaluna
ayah_english: Then when Musa fulfilled Musa fulfilled the term and was traveling with his family he saw in (the) direction (of) Mount Tur a fire He said to his family Stay here indeed, I [I] perceive a fire Perhaps I will bring you from there some information or a burning wood from the fire so that you may warm yourselves

ayah: ۞فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَجَلَ وَسَارَ بِأَهۡلِهِۦٓ ءَانَسَ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ نَارٗاۖ قَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ جَذۡوَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ

ayah: ۞فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَجَلَ وَسَارَ بِأَهۡلِهِۦٓ ءَانَسَ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ نَارٗاۖ قَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ جَذۡوَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِيَ مِن شَٰطِيِٕ ٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ فِي ٱلۡبُقۡعَةِ ٱلۡمُبَٰرَكَةِ مِنَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ أَن يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma ataha nudiya min shati-i al-wadi al-aymani fi al-buq'ati al-mubarakati mina al-shajarati an yamusa inni ana al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
ayah_english: But when he came (to) it he was called from (the) side (of) the valley the right in the place even blessed from the tree that O Musa! Indeed I Am Allah (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَتَىٰهَا نُودِيَ مِن شَٰطِيِٕ ٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ فِي ٱلۡبُقۡعَةِ ٱلۡمُبَٰرَكَةِ مِنَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ أَن يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: وَأَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَقۡبِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-an alqi asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu ka-annaha jannun walla mud'biran walam yu'aqqib yamusa aqbil wala takhaf innaka mina al-aminina
ayah_english: And [that] throw your staff But when he saw it moving as if it (were) a snake he turned (in) flight and (did) not return O Musa! Draw near and (do) not fear Indeed you (are) of the secure

ayah: وَأَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَقۡبِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-an alqi asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu ka-annaha jannun walla mud'biran walam yu'aqqib yamusa aqbil wala takhaf innaka mina al-aminina
ayah_english: And [that] throw your staff But when he saw it moving as if it (were) a snake he turned (in) flight and (did) not return O Musa! Draw near and (do) not fear Indeed you (are) of the secure

ayah: ٱسۡلُكۡ يَدَكَ فِي جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُجۡ بَيۡضَآءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ سُوٓءٖ وَٱضۡمُمۡ إِلَيۡكَ جَنَاحَكَ مِنَ ٱلرَّهۡبِۖ فَذَٰنِكَ بُرۡهَٰنَانِ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: us'luk yadaka fi jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri suin wa-ud'mum ilayka janahaka mina al-rahbi fadhanika bur'hanani min rabbika ila fir'awna wamala-ihi innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
ayah_english: Insert your hand in your bosom it will come forth white without without any harm And draw to yourselves your hand against fear So these (are) two evidences from your Lord to Firaun and his chiefs Indeed, they are a people defiantly disobedient

ayah: ٱسۡلُكۡ يَدَكَ فِي جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُجۡ بَيۡضَآءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ سُوٓءٖ وَٱضۡمُمۡ إِلَيۡكَ جَنَاحَكَ مِنَ ٱلرَّهۡبِۖ فَذَٰنِكَ بُرۡهَٰنَانِ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

ayah: ٱسۡلُكۡ يَدَكَ فِي جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُجۡ بَيۡضَآءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ سُوٓءٖ وَٱضۡمُمۡ إِلَيۡكَ جَنَاحَكَ مِنَ ٱلرَّهۡبِۖ فَذَٰنِكَ بُرۡهَٰنَانِ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi inni qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhafu an yaqtuluni
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Indeed I killed of them a man and I fear that they will kill me

ayah: وَأَخِي هَٰرُونُ هُوَ أَفۡصَحُ مِنِّي لِسَانٗا فَأَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعِيَ رِدۡءٗا يُصَدِّقُنِيٓۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-akhi harunu huwa afsahu minni lisanan fa-arsil'hu ma'iya rid'an yusaddiquni inni akhafu an yukadhibuni
ayah_english: And my brother Harun he (is) more eloquent than me (in) speech so send him with me (as) a helper who will confirm me Indeed I fear that they will deny me

ayah_english: And my brother Harun he (is) more eloquent than me (in) speech so send him with me (as) a helper who will confirm me Indeed I fear that they will deny me

ayah: وَأَخِي هَٰرُونُ هُوَ أَفۡصَحُ مِنِّي لِسَانٗا فَأَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعِيَ رِدۡءٗا يُصَدِّقُنِيٓۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-akhi harunu huwa afsahu minni lisanan fa-arsil'hu ma'iya rid'an yusaddiquni inni akhafu an yukadhibuni
ayah_english: And my brother Harun he (is) more eloquent than me (in) speech so send him with me (as) a helper who will confirm me Indeed I fear that they will deny me

ayah: وَأَخِي هَٰرُونُ هُوَ أَفۡصَحُ مِنِّي لِسَانٗا فَأَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعِيَ رِدۡءٗا يُصَدِّقُنِيٓۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-akhi harunu huwa afsahu minni lisanan fa-arsil'hu ma'iya rid'an yusaddiquni inni akhafu an yukadhibuni
ayah_english: And my brother Harun he (is) more eloquent than me (in) speech so send him with me (as) a helper who will confirm me Indeed I fear that they will deny me

ayah: قَالَ سَنَشُدُّ عَضُدَكَ بِأَخِيكَ وَنَجۡعَلُ لَكُمَا سُلۡطَٰنٗا فَلَا يَصِلُونَ إِلَيۡكُمَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ أَنتُمَا وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكُمَا ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: qala sanashuddu adudaka bi-akhika wanaj'alu lakuma sul'tanan fala yasiluna ilaykuma biayatina antuma wamani ittaba'akuma al-ghalibuna
ayah_english: He said We will strengthen your arm through your brother and We will make for both of you an authority so not they will reach to both of you Through Our Signs you two and (those) who follow you (will) be the dominant

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّفۡتَرٗى وَمَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِيٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaahum musa biayatina bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa sih'run muf'taran wama sami'na bihadha fi abaina al-awalina
ayah_english: But when came to them Musa with Our Signs clear they said Not (is) this except a magic invented and not we heard of this among our forefathers our forefathers

ayah_english: But when came to them Musa with Our Signs clear they said Not (is) this except a magic invented and not we heard of this among our forefathers our forefathers

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّفۡتَرٗى وَمَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِيٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۡ عِندِهِۦ وَمَن تَكُونُ لَهُۥ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلدَّارِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala musa rabbi a'lamu biman jaa bil-huda min indihi waman takunu lahu aqibatu al-dari innahu la yuf'lihu al-zalimuna
ayah_english: And Musa said And Musa said My Lord knows best of who has come with [the] guidance from Him from Him and who will be for him the good end in the Hereafter the good end in the Hereafter Indeed not will be successful the wrongdoers

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَأُ مَا عَلِمۡتُ لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرِي فَأَوۡقِدۡ لِي يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلطِّينِ فَٱجۡعَل لِّي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَطَّلِعُ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala fir'awnu yaayyuha al-mala-u ma alim'tu lakum min ilahin ghayri fa-awqid li yahamanu ala al-tini fa-ij'al li sarhan la'alli attali'u ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu mina al-kadhibina
ayah_english: And Firaun said And Firaun said O chiefs O chiefs Not I know for you any god other than me So kindle for me O Haman Upon the clay and make for me a lofty tower so that [I] I may look at (the) God (of) Musa And indeed, I [I] think that he (is) of the liars

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَأُ مَا عَلِمۡتُ لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرِي فَأَوۡقِدۡ لِي يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلطِّينِ فَٱجۡعَل لِّي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَطَّلِعُ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala fir'awnu yaayyuha al-mala-u ma alim'tu lakum min ilahin ghayri fa-awqid li yahamanu ala al-tini fa-ij'al li sarhan la'alli attali'u ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu mina al-kadhibina

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَأُ مَا عَلِمۡتُ لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرِي فَأَوۡقِدۡ لِي يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلطِّينِ فَٱجۡعَل لِّي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَطَّلِعُ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

ayah: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunuduhu fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wazannu annahum ilayna la yur'ja'una
ayah_english: And he was arrogant And he was arrogant and his hosts in the land without right and they thought that they to Us not will be returned

ayah: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah_translit: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunuduhu fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wazannu annahum ilayna la yur'ja'una

ayah: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-akhadhnahu wajunudahu fanabadhnahum fi al-yami fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-zalimina
ayah_english: So We seized him and his hosts and We threw them in the sea So see how was (the) end (of) the wrongdoers

ayah: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alnahum a-immatan yad'una ila al-nari wayawma al-qiyamati la yunsaruna
ayah_english: And We made them leaders inviting to the Fire and (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection not they will be helped

ayah: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-atba'nahum fi hadhihi al-dun'ya la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati hum mina al-maqbuhina
ayah_english: And We caused to follow them in this world a curse and (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection they (will be) of the despised
word_tranlation: And We caused to follow them

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ بَصَآئِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba min ba'di ma ahlakna al-quruna al-ula basaira lilnnasi wahudan warahmatan la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And verily We gave Musa the Scripture after [what] after [what] after [what] We had destroyed the generations former (as) an enlightenment for the mankind and a guidance and mercy that they may remember

ayah_english: And verily We gave Musa the Scripture after [what] after [what] after [what] We had destroyed the generations former (as) an enlightenment for the mankind and a guidance and mercy that they may remember

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ بَصَآئِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wama kunta bijanibi al-gharbiyi idh qadayna ila musa al-amra wama kunta mina al-shahidina
ayah_english: And not you were on (the) side western when We decreed to Musa the Commandment and not you were among the witnesses

ayah: وَلَٰكِنَّآ أَنشَأۡنَا قُرُونٗا فَتَطَاوَلَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۚ وَمَا كُنتَ ثَاوِيٗا فِيٓ أَهۡلِ مَدۡيَنَ تَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا وَلَٰكِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ
ayah_translit: walakinna anshana qurunan fatatawala alayhimu al-'umuru wama kunta thawiyan fi ahli madyana tatlu alayhim ayatina walakinna kunna mur'silina
ayah_english: But We [We] produced generations and prolonged for them the life And not you were a dweller among (the) people (of) Madyan reciting to them Our Verses but We [We] were the Senders

ayah_translit: walakinna anshana qurunan fatatawala alayhimu al-'umuru wama kunta thawiyan fi ahli madyana tatlu alayhim ayatina walakinna kunna mur'silina

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ إِذۡ نَادَيۡنَا وَلَٰكِن رَّحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kunta bijanibi al-turi idh nadayna walakin rahmatan min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And not you were at (the) side (of) the Tur when We called But (as) a mercy from your Lord so that you warn a people not (had) come to them any warner before you before you so that they may remember

ayah_translit: wama kunta bijanibi al-turi idh nadayna walakin rahmatan min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And not you were at (the) side (of) the Tur when We called But (as) a mercy from your Lord so that you warn a people not (had) come to them any warner before you before you so that they may remember

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ إِذۡ نَادَيۡنَا وَلَٰكِن رَّحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن تُصِيبَهُم مُّصِيبَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُواْ رَبَّنَا لَوۡلَآ أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُولٗا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَٰتِكَ وَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walawla an tusibahum musibatun bima qaddamat aydihim fayaqulu rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasulan fanattabi'a ayatika wanakuna mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And if not [that] struck them a disaster for what had sent forth their hands and they would say Our Lord! Why not You sent to us a Messenger so we (could have) followed Your Verses and we (would) have been of the believers

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُوتِيَ مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ قَالُواْ سِحۡرَانِ تَظَٰهَرَا وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِكُلّٖ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaahumu al-haqu min indina qalu lawla utiya mith'la ma utiya musa awalam yakfuru bima utiya musa min qablu qalu sih'rani tazahara waqalu inna bikullin kafiruna
ayah_english: But when came to them the truth from Us from Us they said Why not he was given (the) like (of) what was given (to) Musa Did not they disbelieve in what was given (to) Musa before before They said Two magic (works) supporting each other And they said Indeed, we in all (are) disbelievers

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُوتِيَ مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ قَالُواْ سِحۡرَانِ تَظَٰهَرَا وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِكُلّٖ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah_translit: falamma jaahumu al-haqu min indina qalu lawla utiya mith'la ma utiya musa awalam yakfuru bima utiya musa min qablu qalu sih'rani tazahara waqalu inna bikullin kafiruna

ayah: قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمَآ أَتَّبِعۡهُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul fatu bikitabin min indi al-lahi huwa ahda min'huma attabi'hu in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say Then bring a Book from Allah from Allah from Allah which (is) a better guide than both of them that I may follow it if you are truthful

ayah: فَإِن لَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكَ فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّمَا يَتَّبِعُونَ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ بِغَيۡرِ هُدٗى مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-in lam yastajibu laka fa-i'lam annama yattabi'una ahwaahum waman adallu mimmani ittaba'a hawahu bighayri hudan mina al-lahi inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
ayah_english: But if not they respond to you then know that only they follow their desires And who (is) more astray than (one) who follows his own desire without guidance from Allah Indeed Allah (does) not guide the people the wrongdoers

ayah: فَإِن لَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكَ فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّمَا يَتَّبِعُونَ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ بِغَيۡرِ هُدٗى مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: فَإِن لَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكَ فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّمَا يَتَّبِعُونَ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ بِغَيۡرِ هُدٗى مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minuna

ayah: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha yut'la alayhim qalu amanna bihi innahu al-haqu min rabbina inna kunna min qablihi mus'limina
ayah_english: And when it is recited to them they say We believe in it Indeed, it (is) the truth from our Lord Indeed, we [we] were before it before it Muslims

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡتَوۡنَ أَجۡرَهُم مَّرَّتَيۡنِ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bima sabaru wayadrauna bil-hasanati al-sayi-ata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
ayah_english: Those will be given their reward twice because they are patient and they repel with good the evil and from what We have provided them they spend

ayah: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ ٱللَّغۡوَ أَعۡرَضُواْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ لَنَآ أَعۡمَٰلُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا نَبۡتَغِي ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha sami'u al-laghwa a'radu anhu waqalu lana a'maluna walakum a'malukum salamun alaykum la nabtaghi al-jahilina
ayah_english: And when they hear vain talk they turn away from it and say For us our deeds and for you your deeds Peace (be) on you not we seek the ignorant

ayah: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ ٱللَّغۡوَ أَعۡرَضُواْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ لَنَآ أَعۡمَٰلُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا نَبۡتَغِي ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

ayah: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ ٱللَّغۡوَ أَعۡرَضُواْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ لَنَآ أَعۡمَٰلُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا نَبۡتَغِي ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

ayah_english: And when they hear vain talk they turn away from it and say For us our deeds and for you your deeds Peace (be) on you not we seek the ignorant

ayah: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
ayah_translit: innaka la tahdi man ahbabta walakinna al-laha yahdi man yashau wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
ayah_english: Indeed you (can) not guide whom you love but Allah guides whom He wills And He (is) most knowing (of) the guided ones

ayah_english: Indeed you (can) not guide whom you love but Allah guides whom He wills And He (is) most knowing (of) the guided ones

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِن نَّتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ مَعَكَ نُتَخَطَّفۡ مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَآۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُمَكِّن لَّهُمۡ حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا يُجۡبَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ ثَمَرَٰتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رِّزۡقٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu in nattabi'i al-huda ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardina awalam numakkin lahum haraman aminan yuj'ba ilayhi thamaratu kulli shayin riz'qan min ladunna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And they say If we follow the guidance with you we would be swept from our land Have not We established for them a sanctuary secure are brought to it fruits (of) all things a provision from Us But most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِن نَّتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ مَعَكَ نُتَخَطَّفۡ مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَآۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُمَكِّن لَّهُمۡ حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا يُجۡبَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ ثَمَرَٰتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رِّزۡقٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِن نَّتَّبِعِ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ مَعَكَ نُتَخَطَّفۡ مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَآۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُمَكِّن لَّهُمۡ حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا يُجۡبَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ ثَمَرَٰتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رِّزۡقٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةِۭ بَطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَاۖ فَتِلۡكَ مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡكَن مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ وَكُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna min qaryatin batirat ma'ishataha fatil'ka masakinuhum lam tus'kan min ba'dihim illa qalilan wakunna nahnu al-warithina
ayah_english: And how many We have destroyed of a town which exulted (in) its means of livelihood And these (are) their dwellings not have been inhabited after them after them except a little And indeed, [We] We (are) the inheritors

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةِۭ بَطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَاۖ فَتِلۡكَ مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡكَن مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ وَكُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡعَثَ فِيٓ أُمِّهَا رَسُولٗا يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَاۚ وَمَا كُنَّا مُهۡلِكِي ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا وَأَهۡلُهَا ظَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana rabbuka muh'lika al-qura hatta yab'atha fi ummiha rasulan yatlu alayhim ayatina wama kunna muh'liki al-qura illa wa-ahluha zalimuna
ayah_english: And not was your Lord (the) one to destroy the towns until He (had) sent in their mother (town) a Messenger reciting to them Our Verses And not We would be (the) one to destroy the towns except while their people (were) wrongdoers

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡعَثَ فِيٓ أُمِّهَا رَسُولٗا يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَاۚ وَمَا كُنَّا مُهۡلِكِي ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا وَأَهۡلُهَا ظَٰلِمُونَ

ayah: وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَمَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتُهَاۚ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama utitum min shayin famata'u al-hayati al-dun'ya wazinatuha wama inda al-lahi khayrun wa-abqa afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: And whatever you have been given from things (is) an enjoyment (of the) life (of) the world and its adornment And what (is) with Allah (is) better and more lasting So (will) not you use intellect

ayah: أَفَمَن وَعَدۡنَٰهُ وَعۡدًا حَسَنٗا فَهُوَ لَٰقِيهِ كَمَن مَّتَّعۡنَٰهُ مَتَٰعَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ هُوَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ
ayah_translit: afaman wa'adnahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laqihi kaman matta'nahu mata'a al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma huwa yawma al-qiyamati mina al-muh'darina
ayah_english: Then is (he) whom We have promised him a promise good and he (will) meet it like (the one) whom We provided him enjoyment (of the) life (of) the world then he (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection (will be) among those presented

ayah: أَفَمَن وَعَدۡنَٰهُ وَعۡدًا حَسَنٗا فَهُوَ لَٰقِيهِ كَمَن مَّتَّعۡنَٰهُ مَتَٰعَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ هُوَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
ayah_english: And (the) Day He will call them and say Where (are) My partners whom you used (to) claim

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ رَبَّنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَغۡوَيۡنَآ أَغۡوَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا غَوَيۡنَاۖ تَبَرَّأۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كَانُوٓاْ إِيَّانَا يَعۡبُدُونَ
ayah_translit: qala alladhina haqqa alayhimu al-qawlu rabbana haulai alladhina aghwayna aghwaynahum kama ghawayna tabarrana ilayka ma kanu iyyana ya'buduna
ayah_english: (Will) say those (has) come true against whom the Word Our Lord These (are) those whom we led astray We led them astray as we were astray We declare our innocence before You Not they used (to) worship us worship us

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ رَبَّنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَغۡوَيۡنَآ أَغۡوَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا غَوَيۡنَاۖ تَبَرَّأۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كَانُوٓاْ إِيَّانَا يَعۡبُدُونَ

ayah_english: (Will) say those (has) come true against whom the Word Our Lord These (are) those whom we led astray We led them astray as we were astray We declare our innocence before You Not they used (to) worship us worship us

ayah: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: waqila id'u shurakaakum fada'awhum falam yastajibu lahum wara-awu al-'adhaba law annahum kanu yahtaduna
ayah_english: And it will be said Call your partners And they will call them but not they will respond to them and they will see the punishment If only [that] they had been guided!

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu madha ajabtumu al-mur'salina
ayah_english: And (the) Day He will call them and say What did you answer the Messengers

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

ayah: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-amma man taba waamana wa'amila salihan fa'asa an yakuna mina al-muf'lihina
ayah_english: But as for (him) who repented and believed and did righteousness then perhaps [that] he will be of the successful ones

ayah: وَرَبُّكَ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيَخۡتَارُۗ مَا كَانَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: warabbuka yakhluqu ma yashau wayakhtaru ma kana lahumu al-khiyaratu sub'hana al-lahi wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses Not they have for them the choice Glory be (to) Allah and High is He above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu al-hamdu fi al-ula wal-akhirati walahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And He (is) Allah (there is) no god but He To Him (are due) all praises in the first and the last And for Him (is) the Decision and to Him you will be returned

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum in ja'ala al-lahu alaykumu al-layla sarmadan ila yawmi al-qiyamati man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bidiyain afala tasma'una
ayah_english: Say Have you seen if Allah made Allah made for you the night continuous till (the) Day (of) the Resurrection who (is the) god besides Allah who could bring you light Then will not you hear

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلنَّهَارَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِلَيۡلٖ تَسۡكُنُونَ فِيهِۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

ayah: وَمِن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ لِتَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin rahmatihi ja'ala lakumu al-layla wal-nahara litaskunu fihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
ayah_english: And from His Mercy He made for you the night and the day that you may rest therein and that you may seek from His Bounty and so that you may be grateful

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
ayah_english: And (the) Day He will call them and say Where (are) My partners whom you used (to) claim

ayah: وَنَزَعۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا فَقُلۡنَا هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ فَعَلِمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wanaza'na min kulli ummatin shahidan faqul'na hatu bur'hanakum fa'alimu anna al-haqa lillahi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: And We will draw forth from every nation a witness and We will say Bring your proof Then they will know that the truth (is) for Allah and (will be) lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah: وَنَزَعۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا فَقُلۡنَا هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ فَعَلِمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

ayah: وَنَزَعۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا فَقُلۡنَا هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ فَعَلِمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wanaza'na min kulli ummatin shahidan faqul'na hatu bur'hanakum fa'alimu anna al-haqa lillahi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: And We will draw forth from every nation a witness and We will say Bring your proof Then they will know that the truth (is) for Allah and (will be) lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah: وَنَزَعۡنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا فَقُلۡنَا هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ فَعَلِمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

ayah_english: And We will draw forth from every nation a witness and We will say Bring your proof Then they will know that the truth (is) for Allah and (will be) lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah_english: And We will draw forth from every nation a witness and We will say Bring your proof Then they will know that the truth (is) for Allah and (will be) lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah: ۞إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡكُنُوزِ مَآ إِنَّ مَفَاتِحَهُۥ لَتَنُوٓأُ بِٱلۡعُصۡبَةِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُوَّةِ إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ لَا تَفۡرَحۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَرِحِينَ
ayah_translit: inna qaruna kana min qawmi musa fabagha alayhim waataynahu mina al-kunuzi ma inna mafatihahu latanuu bil-'us'bati uli al-quwati idh qala lahu qawmuhu la tafrah inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-farihina
ayah_english: Indeed Qarun was from (the) people (of) Musa but he oppressed [on] them And We gave him of the treasures which indeed (the) keys of it would burden a company (of men) possessors of great strength possessors of great strength When said to him his people (Do) not exult Indeed Allah (does) not love the exultant

ayah: ۞إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡكُنُوزِ مَآ إِنَّ مَفَاتِحَهُۥ لَتَنُوٓأُ بِٱلۡعُصۡبَةِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُوَّةِ إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ لَا تَفۡرَحۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَرِحِينَ
ayah_translit: inna qaruna kana min qawmi musa fabagha alayhim waataynahu mina al-kunuzi ma inna mafatihahu latanuu bil-'us'bati uli al-quwati idh qala lahu qawmuhu la tafrah inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-farihina
ayah_english: Indeed Qarun was from (the) people (of) Musa but he oppressed [on] them And We gave him of the treasures which indeed (the) keys of it would burden a company (of men) possessors of great strength possessors of great strength When said to him his people (Do) not exult Indeed Allah (does) not love the exultant

ayah: ۞إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡكُنُوزِ مَآ إِنَّ مَفَاتِحَهُۥ لَتَنُوٓأُ بِٱلۡعُصۡبَةِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُوَّةِ إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ لَا تَفۡرَحۡۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَرِحِينَ

ayah_english: Indeed Qarun was from (the) people (of) Musa but he oppressed [on] them And We gave him of the treasures which indeed (the) keys of it would burden a company (of men) possessors of great strength possessors of great strength When said to him his people (Do) not exult Indeed Allah (does) not love the exultant

ayah: وَٱبۡتَغِ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۖ وَلَا تَنسَ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَأَحۡسِن كَمَآ أَحۡسَنَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَلَا تَبۡغِ ٱلۡفَسَادَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-ib'taghi fima ataka al-lahu al-dara al-akhirata wala tansa nasibaka mina al-dun'ya wa-ahsin kama ahsana al-lahu ilayka wala tabghi al-fasada fi al-ardi inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: But seek through what Allah has given you Allah has given you the home (of) the Hereafter and (do) not forget your share of the world And do good as Allah has been good Allah has been good to you And (do) not seek corruption in the earth Indeed Allah (does) not love the corrupters

ayah: وَٱبۡتَغِ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۖ وَلَا تَنسَ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَأَحۡسِن كَمَآ أَحۡسَنَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَلَا تَبۡغِ ٱلۡفَسَادَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِندِيٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَهۡلَكَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡعٗاۚ وَلَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذُنُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala innama utituhu ala il'min indi awalam ya'lam anna al-laha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina al-quruni man huwa ashaddu min'hu quwwatan wa-aktharu jam'an wala yus'alu an dhunubihimu al-muj'rimuna
ayah_english: He said Only I have been given it on (account) (of) knowledge I have Did not he know that Allah indeed destroyed before him before him of the generations who [they] (were) stronger than him (in) strength and greater (in) accumulation And not will be questioned about their sins the criminals

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِندِيٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَهۡلَكَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡعٗاۚ وَلَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذُنُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِندِيٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَهۡلَكَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡعٗاۚ وَلَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذُنُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala innama utituhu ala il'min indi awalam ya'lam anna al-laha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina al-quruni man huwa ashaddu min'hu quwwatan wa-aktharu jam'an wala yus'alu an dhunubihimu al-muj'rimuna
ayah_english: He said Only I have been given it on (account) (of) knowledge I have Did not he know that Allah indeed destroyed before him before him of the generations who [they] (were) stronger than him (in) strength and greater (in) accumulation And not will be questioned about their sins the criminals

ayah: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فِي زِينَتِهِۦۖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا يَٰلَيۡتَ لَنَا مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ قَٰرُونُ إِنَّهُۥ لَذُو حَظٍّ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: fakharaja ala qawmihi fi zinatihi qala alladhina yuriduna al-hayata al-dun'ya yalayta lana mith'la ma utiya qarunu innahu ladhu hazzin azimin
ayah_english: So he went forth to his people in his adornment Said those who desire the life (of) the world O! Would that for us (the) like (of) what has been given (to) Qarun Indeed he (is the) owner (of) fortune great

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗاۚ وَلَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma waylakum thawabu al-lahi khayrun liman amana wa'amila salihan wala yulaqqaha illa al-sabiruna
ayah_english: But said those who were given the knowledge Woe to you! (The) reward (of) Allah (is) better for (he) who believes and does righteous (deeds) And not it is granted except (to) the patient ones

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗاۚ وَلَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗاۚ وَلَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ

ayah_translit: waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma waylakum thawabu al-lahi khayrun liman amana wa'amila salihan wala yulaqqaha illa al-sabiruna
ayah_english: But said those who were given the knowledge Woe to you! (The) reward (of) Allah (is) better for (he) who believes and does righteous (deeds) And not it is granted except (to) the patient ones

ayah: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِهِۦ وَبِدَارِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنتَصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: fakhasafna bihi wabidarihi al-arda fama kana lahu min fi-atin yansurunahu min duni al-lahi wama kana mina al-muntasirina
ayah_english: Then We caused to swallow up him and his home the earth Then not was for him any group (to) help him besides besides Allah and not was (he) of those who (could) defend themselves
word_tranlation: Then We caused to swallow up

ayah: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِهِۦ وَبِدَارِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنتَصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: fakhasafna bihi wabidarihi al-arda fama kana lahu min fi-atin yansurunahu min duni al-lahi wama kana mina al-muntasirina
ayah_english: Then We caused to swallow up him and his home the earth Then not was for him any group (to) help him besides besides Allah and not was (he) of those who (could) defend themselves

ayah: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِهِۦ وَبِدَارِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنتَصِرِينَ

ayah: وَأَصۡبَحَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَمَنَّوۡاْ مَكَانَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِ يَقُولُونَ وَيۡكَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن مَّنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا لَخَسَفَ بِنَاۖ وَيۡكَأَنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-asbaha alladhina tamannaw makanahu bil-amsi yaquluna wayka-anna al-laha yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lawla an manna al-lahu alayna lakhasafa bina wayka-annahu la yuf'lihu al-kafiruna
ayah_english: And began those who (had) wished his position the day before (to) say Ah! That Allah extends the provision for whom He wills of His slaves and restricts it If not that Allah had favored Allah had favored [to] us He would have caused it to swallow us He would have caused it to swallow us Ah! That not will succeed the disbelievers

ayah: تِلۡكَ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ نَجۡعَلُهَا لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُرِيدُونَ عُلُوّٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فَسَادٗاۚ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: til'ka al-daru al-akhiratu naj'aluha lilladhina la yuriduna uluwwan fi al-ardi wala fasadan wal-'aqibatu lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: That the Home (of) the Hereafter We assign it to those who (do) not desire exaltedness in the earth and not corruption And the good end (is) for the righteous

ayah_english: That the Home (of) the Hereafter We assign it to those who (do) not desire exaltedness in the earth and not corruption And the good end (is) for the righteous

ayah: تِلۡكَ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ نَجۡعَلُهَا لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُرِيدُونَ عُلُوّٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فَسَادٗاۚ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: til'ka al-daru al-akhiratu naj'aluha lilladhina la yuriduna uluwwan fi al-ardi wala fasadan wal-'aqibatu lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: That the Home (of) the Hereafter We assign it to those who (do) not desire exaltedness in the earth and not corruption And the good end (is) for the righteous

ayah: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَاۖ وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجۡزَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: man jaa bil-hasanati falahu khayrun min'ha waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fala yuj'za alladhina amilu al-sayiati illa ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: Whoever comes with a good (deed) then for him (will be) better than it and whoever comes with an evil (deed) then not will be recompensed those who do the evil (deeds) except what they used (to) do

ayah: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَاۖ وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجۡزَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah_english: Whoever comes with a good (deed) then for him (will be) better than it and whoever comes with an evil (deed) then not will be recompensed those who do the evil (deeds) except what they used (to) do

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِي فَرَضَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لَرَآدُّكَ إِلَىٰ مَعَادٖۚ قُل رَّبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَمَنۡ هُوَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: inna alladhi farada alayka al-qur'ana laradduka ila ma'adin qul rabbi a'lamu man jaa bil-huda waman huwa fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: Indeed He Who ordained upon you the Quran (will) surely take you back to a place of return Say My Lord (is) most knowing (of him) who comes with the guidance and who he (is) in an error manifest

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِي فَرَضَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لَرَآدُّكَ إِلَىٰ مَعَادٖۚ قُل رَّبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَمَنۡ هُوَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wama kunta tarju an yul'qa ilayka al-kitabu illa rahmatan min rabbika fala takunanna zahiran lil'kafirina
ayah_english: And not you were expecting that would be sent down to you the Book except (as) a mercy from your Lord So (do) not be an assistant to the disbelievers

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah_english: And not you were expecting that would be sent down to you the Book except (as) a mercy from your Lord So (do) not be an assistant to the disbelievers

ayah: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: wala yasuddunnaka an ayati al-lahi ba'da idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'u ila rabbika wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
ayah_english: And (let) not avert you from (the) Verses (of) Allah after [when] they have been revealed to you And invite (people) to your Lord And (do) not be of the polytheists

ayah: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

ayah: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: wala yasuddunnaka an ayati al-lahi ba'da idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'u ila rabbika wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina

ayah_translit: wala yasuddunnaka an ayati al-lahi ba'da idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'u ila rabbika wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
ayah_english: And (let) not avert you from (the) Verses (of) Allah after [when] they have been revealed to you And invite (people) to your Lord And (do) not be of the polytheists

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tad'u ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara la ilaha illa huwa kullu shayin halikun illa wajhahu lahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And (do) not invoke with Allah god other (There is) no god except Him Every thing (will be) destroyed except His Face To Him (is) the Decision and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah_english: And (do) not invoke with Allah god other (There is) no god except Him Every thing (will be) destroyed except His Face To Him (is) the Decision and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tad'u ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara la ilaha illa huwa kullu shayin halikun illa wajhahu lahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And (do) not invoke with Allah god other (There is) no god except Him Every thing (will be) destroyed except His Face To Him (is) the Decision and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
